Reviews.Content: stayed night july city centre hotels stupidly expensive wasnt clean safe private underground car park night fantastic huge ninth floor facing north brilliant view madrid skyline sierra nevada mountain range north city clean walking hours walk centre past bullring las ventas worth look theres metro station 2 minutes walk hotel trains run regularly takes 20 minutes sol centre costs €2 ticket hotel sleep apart staff helpful nice cant comment facilities nice centre cheaper cant beat try views
